Archive.description: Gene archive table is up to date.
Archive.name: Archive

ArraysHaveProbes.description: All arrays are associated with probes.
ArraysHaveProbes.name: ArraysHaveProbes

AssemblyExceptions.description: Check if assembly_exceptions are present and correct.
AssemblyExceptions.name: AssemblyExceptions

AssemblySeqregion.description: assembly and seq_region table are consistent.
AssemblySeqregion.name: AssemblySeqregion

AssemblyTablesAcrossSpecies.description: Assembly is the same in core and core-like databases
AssemblyTablesAcrossSpecies.name: AssemblyTablesAcrossSpecies

AttribValues.description: TSL, APPRIS, GENCODE and RefSeq attributes exist
AttribValues.name: AttribValues

CompareBiotype.description: Check for more than 25% difference between the number of genes in two databases, broken down by biotype.
CompareBiotype.name: CompareBiotype

CoreForeignKeys.description: Check for incorrect foreign key relationships that are not defined by a "foreign_keys.sql" file..
CoreForeignKeys.name: CoreForeignKeys

ForeignKeys.description: Check for incorrect foreign key relationships, as defined by a "foreign_keys.sql" file.
ForeignKeys.name: ForeignKeys

GeneBounds.description: Ensure that genes are within the bounds of their seq_region
GeneBounds.name: GeneBounds

GeneCounts.description: Check that gene counts are correct
GeneCounts.name: GeneCounts

GeneGC.description: Check that every gene has a GC statistic
GeneGC.name: GeneGC

GenomeStatistics.description: Check that genome statistics are present and correct
GenomeStatistics.name: GenomeStatistics

LRG.description: Check that LRG features and seq_regions are correctly associated.
LRG.name: LRG

MetaKeyCardinality.description: Check cardinality of meta data that must be single-valued
MetaKeyCardinality.name: MetaKeyCardinality

MySQLStorageEngine.description: check if database schema uses non-myisam storage engines
MySQLStorageEngine.name: MySQLStorageEngine

PepstatsAttributes.description: Check that every translation has pepstats statistics
PepstatsAttributes.name: PepstatsAttributes

SequenceLevel.description: Check that DNA is attached and only attached to sequence-level seq_regions.
SequenceLevel.name: SequenceLevel

XrefTypes.description: Check that xrefs are only attached to one feature type.
XrefTypes.name: XrefTypes
